named-query.name: VMobiIntErog.findByIdSettoreErogante
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM VMobiIntErog a WHERE a.erSettoreErogId = :idSettoreErogante

named-query.name: CsTbStatoCivile.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select sc from CsTbStatoCivile sc where sc.abilitato = '1' order by sc.descrizione

named-query.name: CsItStepAttrValueBASIC.findByCsItStepId
named-query.query: select a from CsItStepAttrValueBASIC a inner join fetch a.csCfgAttr t where a.csItStepId = :csItStepId

named-query.name: CsTbMotivoChiusuraPai.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbMotivoChiusuraPai cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.ordine

named-query.name: CsTbStatoCivile.findStatoByIdOrigCet
named-query.query: select sc from CsTbStatoCivile sc where sc.abilitato = '1' and sc.idOrigCet like '%' || :idOrigCet || '%' and sc.idOrigCet like '%' || :codEnte || '%'

named-query.name: CsTbStatoCivile.findStatoByDescrizione
named-query.query: select sc from CsTbStatoCivile sc where sc.abilitato = '1' and sc.descrizione like '%' || :descrizione || '%'

named-query.name: CsTbTipologiaFamiliare.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTipologiaFamiliare cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbResponsabilita.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbResponsabilita cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbProblematica.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbProblematica cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbStesuraRelazioniPer.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbStesuraRelazioniPer cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTitoloStudio.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTitoloStudio cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbProfessione.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbProfessione cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTipoContratto.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTipoContratto cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbSettoreImpiego.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbSettoreImpiego cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTutela.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTutela cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbGVulnerabile.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbGVulnerabile cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTipoRapportoCon.findAllAbilParenti
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTipoRapportoCon cs where cs.abilitato = '1' and cs.parente = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTipoRapportoCon.findAllAbilConoscenti
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTipoRapportoCon cs where cs.abilitato = '1' and cs.parente != '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbMapTipoRapGit2Cs.findByRelazPar
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbMapTipoRapGit2Cs cs where cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsTbMapTipoRapGit2Cs.mappaRelazioniEnte
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbMapTipoRapGit2Cs cs where cs.id.ente = :ente

named-query.name: CsTbPotesta.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbPotesta cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbDisponibilita.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbDisponibilita cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTipoPai.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTipoPai cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbContatto.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbContatto cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbIcd10.findAllCodIniziali
named-query.query: select distinct cs.codIniziale from CsTbIcd10 cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.codIniziale

named-query.name: CsTbIcd10.findCodiciByCodIniziale
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbIcd10 cs where cs.abilitato = '1' and cs.codIniziale = :codIniziale order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbIcd9.findAllCodIniziali
named-query.query: select distinct cs.codIniziale from CsTbIcd9 cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.codIniziale

named-query.name: CsTbIcd9.findCodiciByCodIniziale
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbIcd9 cs where cs.abilitato = '1' and cs.codIniziale = :codIniziale order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbMacroAttivita.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbMacroAttivita cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbMacroSegnal.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbMacroSegnal cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbMicroSegnal.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbMicroSegnal cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbMicroAttivita.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbMicroAttivita cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbMicroAttivita.findAllAbilByIdMacro
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbMicroAttivita cs where cs.abilitato = '1' and cs.macroAttivita is not null and cs.macroAttivita.id = :idMacro order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbProbl.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbProbl cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbMotivoSegnal.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbMotivoSegnal cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbDisabEnte.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbDisabEnte cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbDisabGravita.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbDisabGravita cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbDisabTipologia.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbDisabTipologia cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbServComunita.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbServComunita cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbServLuogoStr.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbServLuogoStr cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbServResRetta.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbServResRetta cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbServSemiresRetta.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbServSemiresRetta cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbBuono.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbBuono cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbEsenzioneRiduzione.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbEsenzioneRiduzione cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTipoRetta.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTipoRetta cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbTipoComunita.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTipoComunita cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTipoOperatore.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTipoOperatore cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTipoComunita.findByDescrizione
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTipoComunita cs where cs.descrizione = :descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTipoRientriFami.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTipoRientriFami cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.id

named-query.name: CsTbMotivoChiusuraInt.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbMotivoChiusuraInt cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbInterventiUOL.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbInterventiUOL cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTipoCirc4.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTipoCirc4 cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTipoProgetto.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsTbTipoProgetto cs where cs.abilitato = true order by cs.descrizione

named-query.name: CsOZonaSoc.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select s from CsOZonaSoc s where s.abilitato = '1' order by s.nome

named-query.name: CsCTipoIntervento.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select s from CsCTipoIntervento s where s.abilitato = '1' order by s.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTipoScuola.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select s from CsTbTipoScuola s where s.abilitato = '1' order by s.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbScuola.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select s from CsTbScuola s where s.abilitato = '1' order by s.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbScuola.findComuni
named-query.query: select distinct s.comune from CsTbScuola s where s.abilitato = '1' order by s.comune

named-query.name: CsTbScuola.findByComuneTipo
named-query.query: select s from CsTbScuola s where s.abilitato = '1' and s.comune = :comune and s.tipoScuolaId = :idTipo order by s.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbScuola.findByComuneAnnoTipo
named-query.query: select s from CsTbScuola s where s.abilitato = '1' and s.annoScolastico = :anno and s.tipoScuolaId = :idTipo and s.comune = :comune order by s.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbSchedaMultidim.findByTipo
named-query.query: select s from CsTbSchedaMultidim s where s.tipo = :idTipo order by s.nOrd, s.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbSchedaMultidim.findByTipoCodice
named-query.query: select s from CsTbSchedaMultidim s where s.tipo = :idTipo and s.codice= :codice

named-query.name: CsCComunita.findByDescTipo
named-query.query: select c from CsCComunita c where c.csTbTipoComunita.descrizione=:descrizione order by c.sogggiuRagsoc

named-query.name: CsOOrganizzazione.findByBelfiore
named-query.query: select cs from CsOOrganizzazione cs where cs.abilitato = '1' and belfiore = :belfiore

named-query.name: CsOOrganizzazione.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsOOrganizzazione cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.nome

named-query.name: CsOOrganizzazione.findAllAbilBelfiore
named-query.query: select cs from CsOOrganizzazione cs where cs.abilitato = '1' and cs.belfiore is not null order by cs.nome

named-query.name: CsOOrganizzazione.eliminaById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsOOrganizzazione cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsOSettore.eliminaById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsOSettore cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsCCategoriaSociale.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select cs from CsCCategoriaSociale cs where cs.abilitato = '1' order by cs.nOrd, cs.id

named-query.name: CsCCategoriaSociale.findAbilByDesc
named-query.query: select cs from CsCCategoriaSociale cs where cs.abilitato = '1' and upper(cs.descrizione) like :desc order by cs.nOrd, cs.id

named-query.name: CsCCategoriaSociale.eliminaCategoriaSocialeById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsCCategoriaSociale c WHERE c.id = :id

named-query.name: CsCMedico.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select m from CsCMedico m where m.abilitato = '1' order by m.cognome, m.nome

named-query.name: CsCMedico.findAllAbilByDenominazione
named-query.query: select m from CsCMedico m where m.abilitato = '1' and (upper(m.cognome)||' '||upper(m.nome)) like ('%'||UPPER(:descrizione)||'%') order by m.cognome, m.nome

named-query.name: CsCMedico.findByCodRegionale
named-query.query: select m from CsCMedico m where m.codiceRegionale= :codRegionale

named-query.name: CsVMedico.findByCodReg
named-query.query: select m from CsVMedico m where m.codiceRegionale= :codRegionale

named-query.name: CsCMedico.findByDescrizione
named-query.query: select m from CsCMedico m where (upper(m.cognome)||' '||upper(m.nome)) like ('%'||UPPER(:descrizione)||'%')

named-query.name: CsASoggetto.findByCF
named-query.query: select s from CsASoggettoLAZY s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where UPPER(s.csAAnagrafica.cf) = UPPER(:cf) order by s.dtIns desc

named-query.name: CsASoggetto.findByCaso
named-query.query: select s from CsASoggettoLAZY s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where s.csACaso.id = :casoId

named-query.name: CsASoggetto.findById
named-query.query: select s from CsASoggettoLAZY s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where s.id = :Id

named-query.name: CsASoggetto.findByDenominazione
named-query.query: select s from CsASoggettoLAZY s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where UPPER(s.csAAnagrafica.cognome) || ' ' || UPPER(s.csAAnagrafica.nome) like '%'|| UPPER(:denominazione) ||'%' order by s.csAAnagrafica.cognome, s.csAAnagrafica.nome

named-query.name: CsASoggettoCategoriaSoc.findBySoggetto
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CsASoggettoCategoriaSoc c inner join fetch c.csCCategoriaSociale cs where c.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto order by c.prevalente desc, c.id.dataFineApp desc

named-query.name: CsASoggettoCategoriaSoc.findAttualiBySoggetto
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CsASoggettoCategoriaSoc c inner join fetch c.csCCategoriaSociale ccs where c.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto and c.id.dataFineApp >= :dtRif order by c.prevalente desc, c.id.dataFineApp desc

named-query.name: CsASoggettoCategoriaSoc.findAttualiLAZYBySoggetto
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CsASoggettoCategoriaSocLAZY c inner join fetch c.csCCategoriaSociale ccs where c.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto and c.id.dataFineApp >= :dtRif order by c.prevalente desc, c.id.dataFineApp desc

named-query.name: CsASoggettoCategoriaSoc.eliminaBySoggettoId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsASoggettoCategoriaSoc cs WHERE cs.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :id

named-query.name: CsASoggetto.eliminaSoggettoById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsASoggettoLAZY cs WHERE cs.anagraficaId = :id

named-query.name: CsAAnagrafica.eliminaAnagraficaById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsAAnagrafica cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsASoggettoMedico.findBySoggetto
named-query.query: select cs from CsASoggettoMedico cs inner join fetch cs.csCMedico m inner join cs.csASoggetto s where cs.csCMedico.abilitato = '1' and cs.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto

named-query.name: CsASoggettoMedico.eliminaBySoggettoId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsASoggettoMedico cs WHERE cs.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :id

named-query.name: CsASoggettoStatoCivile.findBySoggetto
named-query.query: select cs from CsASoggettoStatoCivile cs inner join fetch cs.csTbStatoCivile sc inner join fetch cs.csASoggetto s where cs.csTbStatoCivile.abilitato = '1' and cs.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto

named-query.name: CsASoggettoStatoCivile.eliminaBySoggettoId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsASoggettoStatoCivile cs WHERE cs.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :id

named-query.name: CsASoggettoStatus.findBySoggetto
named-query.query: select cs from CsASoggettoStatus cs inner join fetch cs.csTbStatus tbs inner join fetch cs.csASoggetto s where cs.csTbStatus.abilitato = '1' and cs.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto

named-query.name: CsASoggettoStatus.eliminaBySoggettoId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsASoggettoStatus cs WHERE cs.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :id

named-query.name: CsAIndirizzo.findBySoggetto
named-query.query: select i from CsAIndirizzo i where i.csASoggetto.id = :idSoggetto

named-query.name: CsTbTipoIndirizzo.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select ti from CsTbTipoIndirizzo ti where ti.abilitato = '1' order by ti.descrizione

named-query.name: CsTbTipoContributo.findAllAbil
named-query.query: select ti from CsTbTipoContributo ti where ti.abilitato = '1' order by ti.descrizione

named-query.name: CsAIndirizzo.eliminaBySoggettoId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsAIndirizzo cs WHERE cs.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :id

named-query.name: CsAAnaIndirizzo.eliminaById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsAAnaIndirizzo cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsItStep.getIterStepListByCaso
named-query.query: select its from CsItStep its where its.csACaso.id = :idCaso order by its.id desc

named-query.name: CsItStepLAZY.getIterStepLAZYListByCaso
named-query.query: select its from CsItStepLAZY its left join fetch its.csOOperatore1 left join fetch its.csOOperatore2 left join fetch its.csCfgItStato left join fetch its.csOSettore1 inner join fetch its.csOOrganizzazione1 inner join fetch its.csOSettore1 left join fetch its.csOOrganizzazione2 left join fetch its.csOSettore2 where its.csACasoId = :csACasoId order by its.id desc

named-query.name: CsItStep.getLastIterStepByCaso
named-query.query: select its from CsItStep its left join fetch its.csOOperatore1 left join fetch its.csOOperatore2 where its.csACaso.id = :idCaso and its.id = (select max(its2.id) from CsItStep its2 where its.csACaso.id=its2.csACaso.id)

named-query.name: CsItStepLAZY.getLastIterStepLAZYByCaso
named-query.query: select its from CsItStepLAZY its left join fetch its.csOOperatore1 left join fetch its.csOOperatore2 left join fetch its.csCfgItStato left join fetch its.csOSettore1 inner join fetch its.csOOrganizzazione1 inner join fetch its.csOSettore1 left join fetch its.csOOrganizzazione2 left join fetch its.csOSettore2 where its.csACasoId = :idCaso and its.id = (select max(its2.id) from CsItStepLAZY its2 where its.csACasoId=its2.csACasoId)

named-query.name: CsCfgItTransizione.findTransizionesByStatoRuolo
named-query.query: select itt from CsCfgItRuoloTransizione itgt join itgt.csCfgItTransizione itt where itgt.nomeRuolo LIKE '%'|| UPPER(:nomeRuolo) ||'%' and itt.csCfgItStatoDa.id = :idStato

named-query.name: CsCfgAttrOption.findAttrOptionByCfgAttr
named-query.query: select op from CsCfgAttrOption op where op.csCfgAttr.id = :idCfgAttr order by op.ordine

named-query.name: CsAlert.getAlertByIdCasoTipo
named-query.query: select a from CsAlert a where a.csACaso.id = :idCaso and tipo = :tipo

named-query.name: CsAlertConfig.getAlertConfigByTipo
named-query.query: select a from CsAlertConfig a where a.tipo = :tipo

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.findOperatoriByTipoId
named-query.query: select oto from CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto where oto.csTbTipoOperatore.id = :id and oto.csTbTipoOperatore.abilitato = '1' order by oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.csOOperatoreAnagrafica.cognome, oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.csOOperatoreAnagrafica.nome, oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.username

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.findOperatoriByTipoIdSettore
named-query.query: select oto from CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto where oto.csTbTipoOperatore.id = :idTipo and oto.csTbTipoOperatore.abilitato = '1' and oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOSettore.id = :idSettore order by oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.csOOperatoreAnagrafica.cognome, oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.csOOperatoreAnagrafica.nome, oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.username

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.findOperatoriByTipoDescrizione
named-query.query: select oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore from CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto where oto.csTbTipoOperatore.descrizione = :descrizione and oto.csTbTipoOperatore.abilitato = '1' order by oto.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.username

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.findOperatoriByCatSociale
named-query.query: select DISTINCT o from CsOOperatoreSettore os inner join os.csOOperatore o , CsRelSettoreCatsoc sc where os.csOSettore.id = sc.csOSettore.id and sc.csCCategoriaSociale.id = :idCatSociale order by o.username

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.findTipoByOperatoreSettore
named-query.query: select oto from CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto where oto.csOOperatoreSettore.id = :idOpSet and oto.dataFineApp >= :dataFineApp and oto.csTbTipoOperatore.abilitato = '1' order by oto.csTbTipoOperatore.descrizione

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore.eliminaTipoOperatoreById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto WHERE oto.id = :id

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore.eliminaTipoOperatoreByIdOperatoreSettore
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto WHERE oto.csOOperatoreSettore.id = :idOpSet

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe.eliminaCasoOpeTipoOpeByIdOperatoreSettore
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsACasoOpeTipoOpe coto WHERE coto.operatoreTipoOperatoreId = (SELECT oto.id FROM CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore oto WHERE oto.csOOperatoreSettore.id = :idOpSet)

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.getOperatoreByUsername
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatore it where UPPER(it.username) = UPPER(:username)

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreBASIC.getOperatoreBASICByUserName
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatoreBASIC it where UPPER(it.username) = UPPER(:username)

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.getOperatoreById
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatore it where it.id = :idOp

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.getOperatoreSettoreById
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatoreSettore it where it.csOOperatore.id = :idOp and it.dataFineApp >= :date and it.csOSettore.id = :idSettore

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.findAll
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatoreSettore it

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.findOperatoreSettoreBySettore
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatoreSettore it where it.csOSettore.id = :idSettore order by it.dataFineApp desc, it.csOOperatore.abilitato desc, it.csOOperatore.csOOperatoreAnagrafica.cognome

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.findOperatoreSettoreByOperatore
named-query.query: select it from CsOOperatoreSettore it where it.csOOperatore.id = :idOp and it.dataFineApp >= :date order by it.csOSettore.csOOrganizzazione.id, it.csOSettore.id

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreSettore.eliminaOperatoreSettoreById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsOOperatoreSettore os WHERE os.id = :id

named-query.name: CsOSettore.findAll
named-query.query: select it from CsOSettore it order by it.nOrd, it.csOOrganizzazione.nome, it.nome

named-query.name: CsOSettore.findSettoreBASICByOrganizzazione
named-query.query: select it from CsOSettoreBASIC it left join fetch it.csAAnaIndirizzo ind where it.csOOrganizzazioneId = :idOrganizzazione order by it.nOrd, it.nome

named-query.name: CsOOrganizzazione.findAll
named-query.query: select it from CsOOrganizzazione it order by it.nome

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppoGit.getFamigliaGruppoGitBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsAFamigliaGruppoGit it inner join fetch it.csASoggetto s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where it.csASoggetto.id = :idSoggetto

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppoGit.getFamigliaGruppoGitAggiornate
named-query.query: select distinct it from CsAFamigliaGruppoGit it inner join fetch it.csASoggetto s inner join fetch s.csACaso c where it.flgSegnalazione = '1'

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppo.getFamigliaGruppoById
named-query.query: select it from CsAFamigliaGruppo it where it.id = :id

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppo.getFamigliaGruppoBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsAFamigliaGruppo it where it.csASoggetto.id = :idSoggetto order by it.dataFineApp desc, it.dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppo.getFamigliaGruppoAllaDataBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsAFamigliaGruppo it where it.csASoggetto.id = :idSoggetto and :dtVal between it.dataInizioApp and it.dataFineApp

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppo.getAnaSoggettoFamiglieGruppo
named-query.query: select distinct fg.csASoggetto from CsAFamigliaGruppo fg JOIN FETCH fg.csASoggetto.csACaso LEFT JOIN FETCH fg.csASoggetto.csAFamigliaGruppos where fg.id IN :famigliaIds

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppo.getAnaComponentiGiaFamigliariSoggettoCf
named-query.query: select comp from CsAFamigliaGruppo fg inner join fg.csAComponentes comp where fg.id IN :famigliaIds and comp.csAAnagrafica.cf!= :cfSoggetto order by comp.csAAnagrafica.cognome, comp.csAAnagrafica.nome, comp.id desc

named-query.name: CsAFamigliaGruppo.eliminaFamigliaGruppoById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsAFamigliaGruppo cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsAComponente.eliminaComponenteById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsAComponente cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsAComponente.getComponenteNotInByFamigliaGruppoId
named-query.query: SELECT cs FROM CsAComponente cs WHERE cs.csAFamigliaGruppo.id = :id AND cs.id NOT IN (:listaId)

named-query.name: CsADisabilita.getDisabilitaBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsADisabilita it where it.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto order by it.dataFineApp desc, dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsADisabilita.eliminaDisabilitaById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsADisabilita cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsADatiSociali.getSocialiBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsADatiSociali it where it.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto order by it.dataFineApp desc, dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsADatiSociali.getSocialiBySoggettoCf
named-query.query: select it from CsADatiSociali it where it.csASoggetto.csAAnagrafica.cf = :cfSoggetto order by it.dataFineApp desc, dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsADatiSociali.eliminaSocialiById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsADatiSociali cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe.findCasoOpeTipoOpebyCasoId
named-query.query: select it from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe it where it.csACaso.id = :casoId

named-query.name: CsADatiInvalidita.getInvaliditaBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsADatiInvalidita it where it.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto order by it.dataFineApp desc, dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsADatiInvalidita.eliminaInvaliditaById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsADatiInvalidita cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsATribunale.getTribunaleBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsATribunale it where it.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto order by it.dataFineApp desc, dataInizioApp desc

named-query.name: CsATribunale.eliminaTribunaleById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsATribunale cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsAServizi.getServiziBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsAServizi it where it.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto

named-query.name: CsAServizi.eliminaServiziById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsAServizi cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsAContributi.getContributiBySoggettoId
named-query.query: select it from CsAContributi it where it.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto

named-query.name: CsAContributi.eliminaContributiById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsAContributi cs WHERE cs.id = :id

named-query.name: CsDDiario.getDiarioByCasoId
named-query.query: select it from CsDDiario it where it.csACaso.id = :casoId

named-query.name: CsDDiario.deleteDiario
named-query.query: delete from CsDDiario d where d.id = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsDClob.delete
named-query.query: delete from CsDClob d where d.id = :idClob

named-query.name: CsDValutazione.delete
named-query.query: delete from CsDValutazione d where d.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsDColloquioBASIC.findBySoggetto
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CsDColloquioBASIC c INNER JOIN FETCH c.csDDiario d INNER JOIN FETCH d.csACaso cs INNER JOIN FETCH cs.csASoggetto sg WHERE sg.anagraficaId = :idSoggetto ORDER BY d.dtAmministrativa desc, nvl(d.dtMod, d.dtIns) desc

named-query.name: CsDColloquioBASIC.findAllColloquio
named-query.query: select it from CsDColloquioBASIC it order by it.csDDiario.dtAmministrativa DESC

named-query.name: CsDValutazione.findAllSchedeValutazione
named-query.query: select v from CsDValutazione v inner join fetch v.csDDiario d inner join fetch d.csOOperatoreSettore os where d.csTbTipoDiario.id= :tipoDiarioId

named-query.name: CsCTipoColloquio.findAllTipoColloquios
named-query.query: select it from CsCTipoColloquio it

named-query.name: CsCDiarioDove.findAllDiarioDoves
named-query.query: select it from CsCDiarioDove it

named-query.name: CsCDiarioConchi.findAllDiarioConchis
named-query.query: select it from CsCDiarioConchi it order by it.id

named-query.name: CsDDiarioDoc.findDiarioDocById
named-query.query: select cs from CsDDiarioDoc cs where cs.id.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsDDiarioDoc.deleteDiarioDocByIdDocumento
named-query.query: delete from CsDDiarioDoc d where d.id.documentoId = :idDocumento

named-query.name: CsDPai.deletePAIByIdDiario
named-query.query: delete from CsDPai d where d.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsDPai.findPaiByCaso
named-query.query: select r from CsDPai r inner join fetch r.csDDiario d inner join fetch d.csOOperatoreSettore os where d.csACaso.id=:idCaso order by d.dtAmministrativa desc

named-query.name: CsDRelazione.findRelazioniByCaso
named-query.query: select r from CsDRelazione r inner join fetch r.csDDiario d inner join fetch d.csOOperatoreSettore os where d.csACaso.id=:idCaso order by d.dtAmministrativa desc

named-query.name: CsDRelazione.findRelazioniInScadenza
named-query.query: select r from CsDRelazione r inner join fetch r.csDDiario d inner join fetch d.csOOperatoreSettore os where d.csOOperatoreSettore.csOSettore.csOOrganizzazione.belfiore=:ente and r.dataProssimaRelazioneDal<= sysdate and not exists (select 1 from CsDDiario d1 where d1.csTbTipoDiario.id=6 and d.csACaso.id=d1.csACaso.id and r.dataProssimaRelazioneDal<= d1.dtAmministrativa) order by d.csACaso.id, d.dtAmministrativa desc, d.dtIns desc

named-query.name: CsDDocIndividuale.findDocIndividualeByCaso
named-query.query: select i from CsDDocIndividuale i where i.csDDiario.csACaso.id=:idCaso order by i.csDDiario.dtAmministrativa desc

named-query.name: CsLoadDocumento.findLoadDocumentoByDiarioId
named-query.query: select d from CsDDiarioDoc d where d.csDDIario.id = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsDDocIndividuale.deleteDocIndividualeByIdDiario
named-query.query: delete from CsDDocIndividuale d where d.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsFlgIntervento.getListaInterventiByIdCaso
named-query.query: select distinct i from CsFlgIntervento f inner join f.csIIntervento i where f.csDDiario.csACaso.id=:casoId order by i.dtIns desc

named-query.name: CsFlgIntervento.countInterventiByIdCaso
named-query.query: select count(distinct f.csIIntervento.id) from CsFlgIntervento f where f.csDDiario.csACaso.id=:casoId

named-query.name: CsFlgIntervento.getPrimoFoglioByIdIntervento
named-query.query: select f from CsFlgIntervento f inner join f.csIIntervento i where f.csIIntervento.id = :interventoId order by f.csDDiario.dtIns asc

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe.deleteByCasoId
named-query.query: delete from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe d where d.casoId = :casoId

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe.deleteById
named-query.query: delete from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe d where d.id= :id

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe2.deleteOpeByCasoId
named-query.query: delete from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe2 d where d.csACaso.id = :casoId

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe.findByCasoId
named-query.query: select d from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe d where d.casoId = :casoId order by d.dataInizioSys

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe2.findOpeByCasoId
named-query.query: select d from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe2 d where d.csACaso.id = :casoId order by d.dataInizioSys

named-query.name: CsFlgIntervento.deleteById
named-query.query: delete from CsFlgIntervento d where d.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsIIntervento.deleteById
named-query.query: delete from CsIIntervento d where d.id = :idIntervento

named-query.name: CsLoadDocumento.deleteLoadDocumentoById
named-query.query: delete from CsLoadDocumento d where d.id = :id

named-query.name: CsSsSchedaSegr.findByIdAnagrafica
named-query.query: select s from CsSsSchedaSegr s where s.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :idAnagrafica

named-query.name: CsDValutazione.findValutazioneById
named-query.query: select v from CsDValutazione v where v.id = :idValutazione

named-query.name: CsDValutazione.findValutazioneBySoggetto
named-query.query: SELECT v FROM CsDValutazione v inner join fetch v.csDDiario d inner join fetch d.csOOperatoreSettore os WHERE d.csACaso.csASoggetto.anagraficaId = :anagraficaId AND d.csTbTipoDiario.id = :tipoDiarioId ORDER BY d.dtAmministrativa DESC

named-query.name: CsDValutazione.findValutazioneByUdcId
named-query.query: SELECT v FROM CsDValutazione v WHERE v.csDDiario.schedaId = :schedaId AND v.csDDiario.csTbTipoDiario.id = :tipoDiarioId ORDER BY v.csDDiario.dtAmministrativa DESC

named-query.name: CsDValutazione.findClobById
named-query.query: select clb from CsDClob clb where clb.id = :idClob

named-query.name: CsDScuola.findScuolaByCaso
named-query.query: select i from CsDScuola i where i.csDDiario.csACaso.id=:idCaso order by i.annoScolastico desc

named-query.name: CsDScuola.deleteScuolaByIdDiario
named-query.query: delete from CsDScuola d where d.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsDIsee.findIseeByCaso
named-query.query: select i from CsDIsee i where i.csDDiario.csACaso.id=:idCaso

named-query.name: CsDIsee.deleteIseeByIdDiario
named-query.query: delete from CsDIsee d where d.diarioId = :idDiario

named-query.name: CsRelSettCsocTipoInter.findTipiInterventoSettCatsoc
named-query.query: select distinct rel.csRelCatsocTipoInter.csCTipoIntervento from CsRelSettCsocTipoInter rel where rel.abilitato= 1 and rel.csRelCatsocTipoInter.csCTipoIntervento.abilitato='1' and rel.id.scsSettoreId = :idSettore and rel.id.scsCategoriaSocialeId IN (:idCatsoc)

named-query.name: CsRelCatsocTipoInter.findTipiInterventoCatSoc
named-query.query: select distinct rel.csCTipoIntervento from CsRelCatsocTipoInter rel, CsASoggettoCategoriaSoc scat where rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = scat.id.categoriaSocialeId and :dtRif between scat.dataInizioApp and scat.id.dataFineApp and scat.csASoggetto.anagraficaId= :idSoggetto and rel.csCTipoIntervento.abilitato='1'

named-query.name: CsRelCatsocTipoInter.findRelCatsocTipointerByCatSoc
named-query.query: select DISTINCT rel from CsRelCatsocTipoInter rel where rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = :idCatsoc

named-query.name: CsRelCatsocTipoInter.eliminaRelCatsocTipointerByIds
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsRelCatsocTipoInter rel where rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = :idCatsoc and rel.id.tipoInterventoId = :idTipointer

named-query.name: CsRelSettoreCatsoc.findRelSettoreCatsocByCatSoc
named-query.query: select DISTINCT rel from CsRelSettoreCatsoc rel where rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = :idCatsoc

named-query.name: CsRelSettoreCatsoc.findRelSettoreCatsocBySettore
named-query.query: select DISTINCT rel, rel.csCCategoriaSociale.nOrd from CsRelSettoreCatsoc rel where rel.id.settoreId = :idSettore order by rel.csCCategoriaSociale.nOrd

named-query.name: CsRelSettoreCatsoc.eliminaRelSettoreCatsocByIds
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsRelSettoreCatsoc rel where rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = :idCatsoc and rel.id.settoreId = :idSettore

named-query.name: CsRelSettCsocTipoInter.findRelSettCatsocTipoInterByCatSoc
named-query.query: select DISTINCT rel from CsRelSettCsocTipoInter rel where rel.id.scsCategoriaSocialeId = :idCatsoc order by rel.id.scsSettoreId, rel.id.cstiTipoInterventoId

named-query.name: CsRelSettCsocTipoInter.eliminaRelSettoreCsocTipointerByIds
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsRelSettCsocTipoInter rel where rel.id.scsCategoriaSocialeId = :idCatsoc and rel.id.scsSettoreId = :idSettore and rel.id.cstiTipoInterventoId = :idTipointer

named-query.name: CsRelRelazioneTipoint.deleteByIdRelazione
named-query.query: delete from CsRelRelazioneTipoint cs where cs.id.relazioneDiarioId = :idRelazione

named-query.name: CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva.findRelSettCatsocEsclusivaByTipoDiarioId
named-query.query: select rel from CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva rel where rel.id.tipoDiarioId = :tipoDiarioId and rel.abilitato = '1'

named-query.name: CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva.findRelSettCatsocEsclusivaByCatSoc
named-query.query: select rel from CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva rel where rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = :catSocId order by rel.id.settoreId, rel.id.tipoDiarioId

named-query.name: CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva.findRelSettCatsocEsclusivaByIds
named-query.query: select rel from CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva rel where rel.id.tipoDiarioId = :tipoDiarioId and rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = :categoriaSocialeId and rel.id.settoreId = :settoreId and rel.abilitato = '1'

named-query.name: CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva.deleteRelSettCatsocEsclusivaByIds
named-query.query: delete from CsRelSettCatsocEsclusiva rel where rel.id.tipoDiarioId = :tipoDiarioId and rel.id.categoriaSocialeId = :categoriaSocialeId and rel.id.settoreId = :settoreId

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe.findResponsabileByCaso
named-query.query: select cs from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe cs where cs.casoId = :casoId and cs.flagResponsabile = 1

named-query.name: CsOOperatore.findResponsabileByCaso
named-query.query: select cs.csOOperatoreTipoOperatore.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe cs where cs.casoId = :casoId and cs.flagResponsabile = 1

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreBASIC.findResponsabileBASICByCaso
named-query.query: select cs.csOOperatoreTipoOperatoreBASIC.csOOperatoreSettoreBASIC.csOOperatoreBASIC from CsACasoOpeTipoOpeBASIC cs where cs.id.casoId = :casoId and cs.flagResponsabile = 1

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore.findOpTipoOpByOpSettore
named-query.query: select cs from CsOOperatoreTipoOperatore cs where cs.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.id = :operatoreId and cs.csOOperatoreSettore.csOSettore.id = :settoreId

named-query.name: CsACasoOpeTipoOpe.findCasoOpeTipoOpeByOpSettore
named-query.query: select cs from CsACasoOpeTipoOpe cs where cs.csOOperatoreTipoOperatore.csOOperatoreSettore.csOOperatore.id = :operatoreId and cs.csOOperatoreTipoOperatore.csOOperatoreSettore.csOSettore.id = :settoreId

named-query.name: CsCfgParametri.findParamBySezioneChiave
named-query.query: select cs from CsCfgParametri cs where cs.id.sezione = :sezione and cs.id.chiave = :chiave

named-query.name: CsCfgIntEsegStato.findIntEsegStatoByTipiStato
named-query.query: select c.csCfgIntEsegStato from CsCfgIntEsegStatoInt c where (c.csCfgIntEsegStato.tipo IN (:tipiStato) AND c.csCfgIntervEseg.tipoIntervento.id = :tipoInterventoId ) order by c.csCfgIntEsegStato.ordine

named-query.name: CsCfgIntEseg.findConfigIntErogByTipoIntervento
named-query.query: select c from CsCfgIntEseg c where c.tipoIntervento.id = :tipoInterventoId

named-query.name: CsCfgAttrOption.findByIdAtt
named-query.query: select c from CsCfgAttrOption c where c.csCfgAttr.id = :idAttributo

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEseg.findIntEsegStatoByIntervento
named-query.query: select inteseg from CsIInterventoEseg inteseg where inteseg.csIInterventoEsegMast.csIIntervento.id = :interventoId

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEseg.findInterventoEsegByIntervento
named-query.query: select inteseg from CsIInterventoEseg inteseg where inteseg.csIInterventoEsegMast.csIIntervento.id = :interventoId order by inteseg.dataEsecuzione desc, inteseg.dtIns desc

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEsegMast.findByInterventoId
named-query.query: select mast from CsIInterventoEsegMast mast where mast.csIIntervento.id = :interventoId

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg.findBeneficiariByMasterId
named-query.query: select sogg from CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg sogg where sogg.master.id = :masterId order by sogg.riferimento desc, sogg.cognome, sogg.nome

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEseg.findInterventoEsegByMasterId
named-query.query: select inteseg from CsIInterventoEseg inteseg where inteseg.csIInterventoEsegMast.id = :masterId order by inteseg.dataEsecuzione desc, inteseg.dtIns desc

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEsegValore.deletebyIdsIntervento
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIInterventoEsegValore cs WHERE cs.csIInterventoEseg.id IN (:listaIds)

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEseg.deleteByIds
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIInterventoEseg cs WHERE cs.id IN (:listaIds)

named-query.name: CsInterventoEsegMast.deleteIntesegMast
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIInterventoEsegMast cs WHERE cs.id = :interventoesegmastId

named-query.name: CsAAnagrafica.findAnagraficaByCf
named-query.query: select cs from CsAAnagrafica cs where cs.cf = :CodFisc

named-query.name: VGerrarchiaServizi.findAllNodesTipoIntervento
named-query.query: select s from VGerrarchiaServizi s where s.flagIntervento = '1'

named-query.name: VLineaFin.getLineeFinanziamentoByEnte
named-query.query: select a from VLineaFin a where a.belfiore = :belfiore

named-query.name: VInterventiRecenti.findAll
named-query.query: select a from VTipiInterventoUsati a order by a.occorrenze desc

named-query.name: VInterventiRecenti.findTipiIntervento
named-query.query: select DISTINCT a.idTipoIntervento, a.descrizioneTipoIntervento from VTipiInterventoUsati a order by a.descrizioneTipoIntervento

named-query.name: VInterventiRecenti.findTipiInterventoCustom
named-query.query: select DISTINCT a.idTipoInterventoCustom, a.descrizioneTipoInterventoCustom from VTipiInterventoUsati a where a.idTipoInterventoCustom is not null order by descrizioneTipoInterventoCustom

named-query.name: CsOOperatoreAnagrafica.findAllOperatoreAnagrafica
named-query.query: select a from CsOOperatoreAnagrafica a order by a.cognome

named-query.name: CsCCategoriaSociale.findByDescrizione
named-query.query: select c from CsCCategoriaSociale c where c.descrizione = :desc

named-query.name: CsIPsExportMast.findPsExportMastInPeriodo
named-query.query: select c from CsIPsExportMast c where c.dataInvio >= :dataDA and c.dataInvio <= :dataA

named-query.name: CsIPsExportMast.countProgressivoCsIPsExportMast
named-query.query: select COUNT(ex) from CsIPsExportMast ex where ex.enteErogatore = :enteErogatore and ex.flusso = :flusso and ex.dtIns >= :dtInsStart and ex.dtIns < :dtInsEnd

named-query.name: CsSsSchedaSegr.deleteSchedaById
named-query.query: delete from CsSsSchedaSegr d where d.id = :idScheda

named-query.name: CsIRigaQuota.deleteById
named-query.query: delete from CsIRigaQuota d where d.id IN (:listaIds)

named-query.name: CsIRigaQuota.findIdsByQuota
named-query.query: select d from CsIRigaQuota d where d.csIQuota.id = :idQuota

named-query.name: CsIQuota.findById
named-query.query: select q from CsIQuota q where q.id = :id

named-query.name: CsIQuota.delete
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIQuota q WHERE q.id = :id

named-query.name: CsIValQuota.delete
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIValQuota vq WHERE vq.id = :id

named-query.name: CsIRigaQuota.delete
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIRigaQuota rq WHERE rq.id = :id

named-query.name: CsIQuotaRipartiz.delete
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CsIQuotaRipartiz qr WHERE qr.id = :id

named-query.name: CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg.findSenzaCaso
named-query.query: select d from CsIInterventoEsegMastSogg d where d.caso is null order by d.id.cf

named-query.name: CsDRelazione.findLastRelazioneProblAperte
named-query.query: select r from CsDRelazione r inner join fetch r.csDDiario d inner join fetch d.csOOperatoreSettore os where d.csACaso.id= :idCaso AND r.flagRilevazioneProblematiche='1' order by d.dtAmministrativa desc
